articles.title: EV maker Rivian narrows losses in Q1, beats on revenue - TechCrunch
articles.description: Rivian reported $661 million in revenue for the first quarter, beating Wall Street expectations. The company also saw net losses narrow.
articles.content:
Rivian may still be burning through cash, but it has managed to narrow losses and generate more revenue as the automaker sells more of its EVs while paring down costs.
